rooms.description: An open-plan living area and kitchen integrated into one space. The kitchen features modern Chettinad-style finishes, with traditional stone accents and custom cabinetry. It includes an island counter with seating for dining.

A master bedroom in the farmhouse style, incorporating large windows that align with Vastu principles to promote positive energy flow and light. Each bedroom is equipped with its own spacious balcony overlooking the scenic surroundings.

A secondary bedroom designed in a traditional Chettinad farmhouse aesthetic, featuring built-in storage and natural wood finishes. This room also enjoys an expansive balcony for privacy and relaxation.

A dedicated home theater area integrated into the living space, with concealed seating arrangements and acoustic panels that blend seamlessly with the farmhouse aesthetic. The design respects Vastu by positioning the room in a location conducive to creative energy.
A modern bathroom featuring traditional Chettinad motifs and fixtures, designed for functional elegance while considering local building norms. The layout ensures privacy and ease of movement.

openings.description: A grand entrance with a covered veranda that reflects the Chettinad aesthetic, featuring traditional carved woodwork and stone accents.
Large windows strategically placed to maximize natural light and promote good ventilation according to Vastu principles.
